content:
CARIN will host a Virtual Connectathon on April 14-15. Connectathon attendees will have the opportunity for hands-on testing of the CARIN Consumer Directed Payer Data Exchange (CARIN IG for Blue Button®) Implementation Guide, learn more about the IG, and have the opportunity to ask the IG developers questions. We expect many of the major payers in the U.S. will be participating. The event is free for all attendees.

Please sign up for the CARIN IG for Blue Button® track here:
http://bit.ly/CARINSignUp
Please sign up for the CARIN IG for Blue Button® track here
http://bit.ly/ZulipCARIN
A Track Page can be found here:
http://bit.ly/TrackPageCARIN
Connectathon Zoom
https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/92253014741?pwd=OWdBcXAzYi9VdlpwdjdjTlBvbnNGZz09 Password: 716820

We will hold an Information Session to provide an overview of the CARIN Connectathon on April 7 at 1 pm ET. We also answered a number of questions that might be helpful as you prepare for the Connectathon.

Zoom: https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/98473934855?pwd=ZzdWRkRzcHBFdHRyT0VJS1ovczNJUT09 Password: 403384

Draft Track Schedule (All times ET)

Times and sessions are subject to change.

Wednesday, April 14

11:00 AM – 11:30 AM
Kick Off
11:30 AM – 12:30 PM
CARIN IG Technical Overview
12:30 PM – 01:00 PM
Ask IG Leads Anything
01:00 PM – 01:15 PM
Break
01:15 PM – 02:00 PM
Aegis Touchstone Overview & Q/A
02:00 PM – 05:00 PM
Client-Server Testing w/ Breakout Rooms
05:00 PM – 06:00 PM
Ask the SMART App Launch Developers Anything

Thursday, April 15

11:00 AM – 11:30 AM
Ask IG Leads Anything
11:30 AM – 02:00 PM
Client-Server Testing w/ Breakout Rooms
02:00 PM – 03:00 PM
Demos/Lessons Learned From Servers & Clients/Client-Server Testing
03:00 PM – 03:30 PM
Wrap-up and Report Out

I have configured https://id.verifymyidentity.com as an OIDC server and https://smart.oauth2.org as a standalone launch patient facing API. This is an OAuth2 provider functioning as a FHIR Proxy. https://smart.oauth2.org functions as a relying party to the upstream OIDC server. If anyone wants trial accounts or to register apps prior to the connectathon, please let me know. OAuth2 Dynamic Client Registration Protocol functions on both tools in case anyone wants to give that a go. Alan +1 304.685.3137.
